name: Wood
description: A regular log of wood. Useful for crafting.

name: Stone
description: A rough stone. Basic building material.

name: Copper Ore
description: Raw copper ore. Can be smelted into ingots.

name: Copper Ingot
description: Refined copper, ready for smithing.

name: Wooden Plank
description: A smooth plank of wood.

name: Hardwood
description: Dense and durable wood from the deep forest.

name: Iron Ore
description: Heavy ore containing iron.

name: Iron Ingot
description: A bar of strong iron.

name: Strengthened Plank
description: Treated wood, harder than stone.

name: Silver Ore
description: Shiny ore with magical conductivity.

name: Silver Ingot
description: A gleaming bar of pure silver.

name: Gold Ore
description: Precious ore that sparkles in the light.

name: Gold Ingot
description: A heavy bar of solid gold. Valuable.

name: Frost Stone
description: A stone that is always cold to the touch.

name: Green Herb
description: A fresh medicinal herb.

name: Red Herb
description: A spicy herb used for strength potions.

name: Slime Gel
description: Sticky goo from a slime.

name: Bone Fragment
description: A piece of old bone.

name: Ghostly Essence
description: Ectoplasm that fades in and out of sight.

name: Yeti Fur
description: Thick, warm white fur.

name: Simple Potion
description: Restores a small amount of health.

name: Rusty Sword
description: Old and brittle, but better than bare hands.

name: Bronze Sword
description: A solid beginner's weapon.

name: Iron Sword
description: A reliable blade of forged iron.

name: Silver Sword
description: Effective against monsters.

name: Gold Sword
description: An ornate sword, sharp and heavy.

name: Leather Tunic
description: Basic protection for travel.

name: Chainmail Armor
description: Interlocking rings provide good defense.

name: Plate Armor
description: Full rigid metal armor.

name: Bronze Pickaxe
description: Better than using your hands.

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: Strikes true against hard rock.

name: Obsidian
description: Volcanic glass, extremely sharp/hard.

name: Volcanic Ash
description: Gray ash warmth to the touch.

name: Sulfur
description: Yellowish powder with a pungent smell.

name: Magma Core
description: The burning heart of a magma entity.

name: Drake Scale
description: Scale from a Fire Drake, warm and tough.

name: Luminite Ore
description: Ore that hums with arcane energy.

name: Crystal Shard
description: A sharp shard of resonant crystal.

name: Mana Wisp Dust
description: Glowing residue from a mana wisp.

name: Phase Silk
description: Silk that shimmers in and out of reality.

name: Prismatic Core
description: The pure essence of arcane light.

name: Obsidian Armor
description: Heavy armor forged from volcanic glass. Unmatched protection.

name: Obsidian Shield
description: A massive slab of obsidian.

name: Crystal Robes
description: Robes woven with phase silk and crystals.

name: Crystal Wand
description: Focuses arcane energy for devastating attacks.

name: Pearl
description: A lustrous gem from the deep.

name: Ancient Moss
description: Bioluminescent moss from sunken ruins.

name: Siren Scale
description: Iridescent scale with magical properties.

name: Coral Fragment
description: Piece of hardened ancient coral.

name: Brass Gear
description: Precision-machined part from a lost age.

name: Steam Canister
description: Pressurized container of motive force.

name: Automaton Core
description: The sparking brain of a clockwork machine.

name: Titanium Plate
description: Extremely durable and lightweight metal.

name: Void Dust
description: Residue from the edge of reality.

name: Ethereal Essence
description: Liquid starlight, cold to the touch.

name: Dark Matter Orb
description: A sphere of concentrated gravity.

name: Entropy Crystal
description: Chaos frozen in crystalline form.

name: Tidal Trident
description: Weaves the power of the ocean.

name: Tidal Armor
description: Armor adorned with coral and pearls.

name: Titanium Claymore
description: Massive yet surprisingly light blade.

name: Titanium Platebody
description: Technologically advanced protection.

name: Void Blade
description: Cuts through the fabric of space.

name: Void Shroud
description: Flowing robes made of nothingness.
